name: NewBay Media
overview: NewBay Media, LLC produces media and information resources to readers, advertisers, and business partners. It offers publications, show dailies, daily and weekly e-newsletters, Websites, online communities, events and marketing services, and expos with a focus on pro audio, broadcast and video, musical instruments, systems integration, and K-12 education markets. The company provides print and Web advertising, tradeshow dailies, rental of email lists and mailing lists, licensing and reprints, media kits, magazines and digital subscriptions, and contests and/or sweepstakes. It also provides live events, such as custom live events/virtual conferences, event sponsorship/marketing partnerships, regional events/road shows, pre- and post-show research opportunities, sweepstakes and at-show events/promotions, tradeshow booth/setup and banner promotions, and tradeshow giveaways; marketing services, such as product development, design, editorial, marketing, circulation, production, printing, and the distribution of custom products that include custom magazines, brochures, advertisements, show dailies, posters, direct mail, white papers, calendars, reprints, and advertorials; and custom publishing services for custom magazines, seminars, creative services, books, email blasts, events, surveys and research, Websites, database marketing, direct mail, Web cast seminars, catalog production, and pod casts. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in New York, New York. It has additional offices in New York, New York; San Francisco and Los Angeles, California; Washington, the District of Columbia; London, the United Kingdom; and Milan, Italy.

acquisitions.source_description: NewBay Media Buys Reed Business Information Mags B&C, Multichannel
